events.name: Ukrainian forces prepare to hoist flag on Snake Island
events.wd_label: Ukrainian forces prepare to hoist flag on Snake Island
events.wd_description: Ukrainian forces are set to hoist the national flag on Snake Island after Russian troops withdrew, marking a significant moment in the ongoing conflict and strategic efforts to ease Moscow's embargo on Ukrainian ports.
events.description: Ukrainian forces are set to hoist the national flag on Snake Island after Russian troops withdrew, marking a significant moment in the ongoing conflict and strategic efforts to ease Moscow's embargo on Ukrainian ports.

events.name: Russian withdrawal
events.wd_description: Russian troops left Snake Island, citing a "gesture of goodwill" to not impede UN efforts for a humanitarian corridor.
events.description: Russian troops left Snake Island, citing a "gesture of goodwill" to not impede UN efforts for a humanitarian corridor.

events.name: Ukrainian preparations
events.wd_description: Ukrainian forces are preparing to hoist the national flag on Snake Island, though it remains unclear if they will maintain a long-term presence.
events.description: Ukrainian forces are preparing to hoist the national flag on Snake Island, though it remains unclear if they will maintain a long-term presence.

events.name: significance of Snake Island
events.wd_description: Control of Snake Island is viewed by Ukraine as a crucial first step in easing Moscow's embargo on its southern ports, despite the risk of bombing.
events.description: Control of Snake Island is viewed by Ukraine as a crucial first step in easing Moscow's embargo on its southern ports, despite the risk of bombing.

events.name: international attention
events.wd_description: Snake Island gained international attention when Russia originally took control in February, and multiple attempts have been made by Ukraine to recover it.
events.description: Snake Island gained international attention when Russia originally took control in February, and multiple attempts have been made by Ukraine to recover it.

events.name: Zelenskiy meets US Congressional delegation in Kyiv
events.wd_label: Zelenskiy meets US Congressional delegation in Kyiv
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy met with a senior US Congressional delegation in Kyiv, promising continued support in the war against Russia.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy met with a senior US Congressional delegation in Kyiv, promising continued support in the war against Russia.

events.name: Zelenskiy’s meeting
events.wd_description: President Zelenskiy met with a senior US Congressional delegation, including Adam Smith, chair of the House Armed Services Committee.
events.description: President Zelenskiy met with a senior US Congressional delegation, including Adam Smith, chair of the House Armed Services Committee.

events.name: US delegation’s statement
events.wd_description: The US delegation stated that the United States, along with allies and partners, has provided economic, military, and humanitarian assistance to Ukraine.
events.description: The US delegation stated that the United States, along with allies and partners, has provided economic, military, and humanitarian assistance to Ukraine.

events.name: additional military aid
events.wd_description: US Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin announced the provision of four additional high mobility artillery rocket systems to Ukraine, bringing the total provided so far to 16.
events.description: US Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin announced the provision of four additional high mobility artillery rocket systems to Ukraine, bringing the total provided so far to 16.

events.name: Attack on Nigerian prison by Boko Haram
events.wd_label: Attack on Nigerian prison by Boko Haram
events.wd_description: The Islamic State claimed responsibility for an attack on a Nigerian prison where approximately 440 inmates escaped, highlighting the ongoing security challenges in the country.
events.description: The Islamic State claimed responsibility for an attack on a Nigerian prison where approximately 440 inmates escaped, highlighting the ongoing security challenges in the country.

events.name: prison attack
events.wd_description: Boko Haram insurgents attacked a medium-security prison to free their members, resulting in one security officer killed and three others injured.
events.description: Boko Haram insurgents attacked a medium-security prison to free their members, resulting in one security officer killed and three others injured.

events.name: prison break
events.wd_description: During the attack, 879 inmates fled the facility, with 443 still at large, four inmates dead, and 16 injured.
events.description: During the attack, 879 inmates fled the facility, with 443 still at large, four inmates dead, and 16 injured.

events.name: President Buhari's response
events.wd_description: President Muhammadu Buhari visited the prison, condemned the attack, and questioned the prison's security system while ordering investigations.
events.description: President Muhammadu Buhari visited the prison, condemned the attack, and questioned the prison's security system while ordering investigations.

events.name: separate attack on presidential convoy
events.wd_description: In a separate incident, the convoy of President Buhari was ambushed on his way to Daura for Islamic festivals, further highlighting the security challenges in Nigeria.
events.description: In a separate incident, the convoy of President Buhari was ambushed on his way to Daura for Islamic festivals, further highlighting the security challenges in Nigeria.

events.name: FlexGen's role in the battery storage and energy grid integration
events.wd_label: FlexGen's role in the battery storage and energy grid integration
events.wd_description: FlexGen, a battery storage startup, integrates batteries into the traditional power grid and develops software to optimize their use, supported by significant funding to expand its capabilities.
events.description: FlexGen, a battery storage startup, integrates batteries into the traditional power grid and develops software to optimize their use, supported by significant funding to expand its capabilities.

events.name: funding raised
events.wd_description: FlexGen raised $100 million from investors, including the Dutch energy company Vitol, to support its battery storage and integration initiatives.
events.description: FlexGen raised $100 million from investors, including the Dutch energy company Vitol, to support its battery storage and integration initiatives.

events.name: integration and optimization
events.wd_description: FlexGen helps integrate batteries into the traditional power grid and develops software to optimize their use, addressing the intermittent nature of renewable energy sources.
events.description: FlexGen helps integrate batteries into the traditional power grid and develops software to optimize their use, addressing the intermittent nature of renewable energy sources.

events.name: customer base
events.wd_description: FlexGen's customers include North Carolina's Electric Cooperatives and Southern California Edison, who rely on its technology for energy storage solutions.
events.description: FlexGen's customers include North Carolina's Electric Cooperatives and Southern California Edison, who rely on its technology for energy storage solutions.

events.name: future plans
events.wd_description: FlexGen plans to open a new innovation and research center in Durham to showcase emerging battery technologies and expand its capabilities.
events.description: FlexGen plans to open a new innovation and research center in Durham to showcase emerging battery technologies and expand its capabilities.
